ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Joint bank accounts wouldn t be that great of an idea... For the reasons you stated, it would, but it would be abused too easily to help *twink* another
ygData.messageBody:
Joint bank accounts wouldn't be that great of an idea... For the reasons you
stated, it would, but it would be abused too easily to help *twink* another
character up...

I think you would start seeing even more (there already are some) lower
level characters wearing the best armor and having the best weapons that
money can buy because they are 'sharing' those items with the 'other'
player...

In other words: I have a level 18 character that has all banded armor and a
Combine Staff - I put it into the bank, log out, log back on as a NEW
character that is level 1... he puts on the armor, grabs the staff, and in
just a few hours he is up to level 10! Not worrying much about getting
killed off because his AC is around 300 or so!

No, no sharing of accounts... BUT, I WOULD like to see some way for GUILDS
to have a 'seperate' account (for officers) to make it easier to handle the
income and outlay of the guilds...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server

all
